articles.title: Comet Fragment Lights up Sky over Spain, Portugal 'Like a Movie' - Asharq Al-awsat - English
articles.description: A bright comet fragment lit up the skies over parts of Spain and Portugal late on Saturday, according to the European Space Agency (ESA), with one Lisbon resident saying the dazzling display "felt like a movie". On Sunday morning, the ESA shared on X a video …
